mapper.select: SELECT noticekey, title, content, VIEWs, writedate, m.NAME name FROM notice n, MEMBER m WHERE n.MEMBERKEY = m.MEMBERKEY order by noticekey
SELECT noticekey, title, content, VIEWs, writedate, m.NAME name FROM notice n, MEMBER m WHERE n.MEMBERKEY = m.MEMBERKEY and noticekey=#{noticekey}
